knimeNode.name: JSONPath Runner
knimeNode.shortDescription: Node for generating text using using the JSONPath template engine

fullDescription.intro:
This node uses the Jayway JsonPath library to extract text from JSON objects.
https://github.com/jayway/JsonPath
This site has good examples of JSONPath expressions as well as an online expression evaluator.
Another good resource on JSONPath is the following site:
JSONPath - XPath for JSON
fullDescription.option:
A list of JSONPath mapping specifications.
The first column specifies the source field name for a JSON object. Once a source field is defined subsequent mappings that use the same source field do not need to respecify the source field.
The second column specifies output field for the JSONPath expression results. An output field must be specified for each mapping.
The third column is used to indicate if the JSONPath expression results get flat mapped to multiple output records. If the expression result produces a list then each element of the list will appear in subsequent output records. In cases where there are multiple flat mapped output lists the longest list determines how many records are generated.
The last column contains the JSONPath expression used to query data from the source JSON object. An expression is required for each mapping.

ports.outPort: Output records. The schema used for the output port is a combination of the input schema and the list of output (text) fields from the JSONPath mappings.
